title: Sampler, 1843
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: cross-stitch embroidery on plain weave
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Purchased in York Harbor.
dimensions: Frame H x W: 76.2 x 35.9 cm (30 x 14 1/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers
description: Chronology of English history from the Battle of Hastings in 1066 to the birth of Albert Edward, Prince of Wales, in 1841.
